business.headline: RBI plans to eliminate loan foreclosure charges and prepayment penalties The central bank has invited feedback from the public and stakeholders on a draft circular directing banks not to levy foreclosure charges and pre-payment penalties on loans by March 21, 2025.

These 3 banks slash loan interest rates after RBI's repo rate cut The RBI, after a gap of five years, announced a reduction in the repo rate by 25 bps to 6.25%. A dip in the repo rate can lead to lower interest rates on loans, thereby making loans cheaper, and vice versa.

Will Donald Trump's tariffs hurt India? Here's what S&P saysIn its latest report, titled 'Asia-Pacific Economies Likely To Be Hit By US Trade Tariffs', S&P pointed out that countries like Vietnam, Taiwan, Thailand, and South Korea have stronger trade ties with the US.
Dalal Street ends in red: Sensex loses over 850 points, IT stocks crashThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 856.55 points to close at 74,454.41, while the NSE Nifty50 shed 242.55 points to end at 22,553.35.

Tax planning 2025: 3 easy ways to maximise tax savings before March 31One can invest in Equity Linked Saving Schemes (ELSS), Public Provident Fund (PPF), life insurance premiums, National Savings Certificate (NSC) and tax-saving fixed deposits, to claim deductions of up to Rs 1,50,000.

Nifty set for longest losing run in 28 years. Should you be worried?The Nifty losing for five months straight is a rare sight. Last time this happened was in 1996, and before that in 1994-95, when it fell 31.4% over eight months. Right now, the index has fallen over 11% since October.

Former ICICI Bank chief Chanda Kochhar launches podcast Chanda Kochhar, 63, joined ICICI Bank in 1984 and worked her way up to become its Managing Director (MD) and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) in 2009.

Will RBI reduce lending rates again in April policy meeting?The recent MPC meeting, held from February 5-7, saw all members agreeing that a rate cut was needed to support slowing economic growth, as inflation was no longer a major concern.

NPS, PPF, or mutual funds: Which SIP investment should you opt for? Are you looking to invest in SIP but unsure where to put your money? Read to know whether you should opt for PPF, NPS, or mutual funds.

Income Tax Bill: What is clubbing of income under family taxation In certain cases, income earned by an individual can be included in another taxpayer's income. In such cases, the latter is eligible to pay taxes not only on his income but also on the income of the other person as well.

Sensex, Nifty in red. 5 things to know about stock market bloodbathSeveral factors are behind the bloodbath on Dalal Street, especially the exodus of foreign institutional investors (FIIs) who have sold stocks over Rs 2 lakh crore since October 2024.
Earning up to Rs 12.75 lakh? Why you should opt for new income tax regimeEarlier, taxpayers earning up to Rs 7 lakh paid nil taxes under the new regime. Now that limit has been raised to Rs 12 lakh.

Sensex tanks 800 points: 3 reasons why stock market is falling todayThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 676.83 points to 74,634.23, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 203.05 points to 22,592.85 as of 10 AM. IT stocks were the worst hit, with HCLTech falling nearly 3%.
Stock market opens in red: Sensex down 700 points. HCLTech falls 3%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 672.83 points to 74,638.23, while the NSE Nifty50 shed 216.80 points to 22,579.10 as of 9:40 AM.

FII selling dampens investor sentiment on Dalal Street: When will it stop? Foreign institutional investors (FII) have been on a selling spree which has hampered investor sentiment on Dalal Street, affecting Sensex and Nifty as they are moving funds to other markets.

Quality Power IPO listing: Will it make a strong market debut? Check latest GMPQuality Power IPO opened for subscription on February 14, 2025, aiming to raise Rs 858.70 crore. The public issue consisted of a fresh issue of 53 lakh shares worth Rs 225 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.49 crore shares worth Rs 633.70 crore.

Meta rewards executives with 200% bonuses despite ongoing job cutsThe bonus for top executives was increased to 200% from 75% and the decision was approved by Meta's Compensation, Nominating, and Governance Committee (CNGC) after recent layoff.

Health insurance: 4 tips to reduce premiums for senior citizens Purchasing a health insurance policy at a younger age can help in securing reduced premium rates. Generally, lower insurance premiums are offered to younger people as they are considered low risk.

Index Funds vs. ETFs: 5 key things every investor should know Exchange-Traded Funds are traded like shares on the stock market and can be sold or purchased at existing market prices during the day, while Index Funds are traded only once at the closure of the share market.

ICMAI demands 'accountant' status for cost accountants in new Income Tax BillIn its memorandum, ICMAI highlighted the extensive training of Cost and Management Accountants (CMAs), which includes expertise in taxation, finance, auditing, corporate laws, and strategic risk management.

New tax regime: 3 deductions that can help taxpayers maximise savings  Though the new regime offered concessional tax rates, it reduced several popular deductions and exemptions, like HRA, LTA, interest on home loans, Section 80C, and more.

AI to take centre stage at the 3rd Digital News Publishers Association ConclaveThrough various keynote sessions, panel discussions and expert presentations, this year's DNPA Conclave aims to decode various critical issues, future strategies, opportunities and models that can power an equitable, inclusive and sustainable digital media ecosystem in an era of rapid technological advancement.
AMFI launches Chhoti SIP, Tarun Yojana, and MITRA. All you need to knowThe latest initiative by AMFI reinforces its goal of making mutual fund investments accessible to all investors across India.

Sensex, Nifty end lower for another session; auto stocks tumbleThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 424.90 points to 75,311.06 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 117.25 points to settle at 22,795.90.

Explained: What are 'high-conviction stocks' and why investors should track themHigh-conviction stocks are shares that investors, analysts, or fund managers strongly believe will deliver higher-than-average returns.

8th Pay Commission: When will it be formed? A look at the past trendsA Pay Commission recommends changes to the salary structure, allowances and benefits to be offered to employees depending upon the prevailing economic structure.

Explained: Why M&M share price tumbled 6% todayThe stock tumbled after the company said it will put money into a rights issue for its two subsidiaries—Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services (MMFSL) and Mahindra Lifespace Developers (MLDL).

Worried about volatile stock market? Check these 10 potential multibagger stocksThe most important factor for determining multibagger stocks is to check earnings and growth potential. Investors should seek stocks that consistently deliver revenue and profit, check metrics like PE ratio and dividend yield, and compare their performance with sectoral or broader market trends.

Planning to start SIP? 2 reasons why you should consider NPSBy investing in NPS, individuals can claim tax benefits of up to Rs 1.5 lakh under Section 80C and an additional Rs 50,000 under Section 80CCD (1B).

Explained: Why Religare Enterprises share price jumped up to 9% today Soon after the announcement, Religare's stock price climbed 8.52% to hit Rs 242 on the Bombay Stock Exchange. At around 11:24 am, shares of the company were trading 2.31% higher at Rs 228.15.

India may let foreign EV makers like Tesla test market before investing: ReportThe government may let foreign electric vehicle makers like Tesla sell cars first and invest later, with final SMEC guidelines expected soon to kickstart local manufacturing incentives.

Sensex tanks nearly 500 points. 3 reasons why stock market is falling todayThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 461.08 points to 75,274.88 at 11:32 am and the NSE Nifty50 fell 144.45 points to trade at 22,768.70. Here are 3 things investors need to know about today's stock market downturn.

Sensex, Nifty fall as FII selling, Trump's tariff threat batter D-StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 272.61 points to 75,463.64 at around 9:51 am, while the NSE Nifty50 declined 91.80 points to 22,821.35.

PNB revises interest rates. Check new home, car and personal loan rates There will be zero processing fees and documentation charges on most of PNB's home loan schemes till March 31, 2025, thereby making housing loans more affordable and more accessible.
LIC Smart Pension Plan: Check eligibility and other details The Smart Pension Plan requires a minimum investment of Rs 1,00,000, while there is no cap on the maximum purchase limit.

Tesla set for India entry with first EV shipment in coming months: Report The US carmaker plans to start selling these cars in the three major cities of Mumbai, Delhi, and Bangalore around the third quarter of the year, say reports.

Sensex ends 200 points lower, Nifty below 23,000; HDFC falls over 2%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 203.22 points lower at 75,735.96, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 19.75 points to settle at 22,913.15.

Will Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs hurt Indian rupee? It may be noted that India was the 10th biggest exporter to the US in 2024, and higher tariffs might make it tougher for Indian businesses to sell their goods there.

Can employers deny gratuity in any situation? Here's all you need to knowWith the latest ruling, the Supreme Court has stated that if an employer dismisses an employee on grounds of moral turpitude, his gratuity can be forfeited without waiting for a court's verdict.

FIIs continue to dump Indian stocks: Which stocks are feeling the heat? Data from National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) showed that FPIs have dumped $3.5 billion worth of financial stocks in 2025 so far, accounting for 31% of their total sales of $11.45 billion as of February 14.

entertainment.headline: Singer Justin Bieber responds to rumours of drug useJustin Bieber's representative has reacted to the reports of the singer's drug use and called them false.

Ranveer Allahbadia runs to car after recording statement in Latent probeRanveer Allahbadia was clicked in a hurried state, running towards his car as the paparazzi tried to capture his pictures on Monday. The YouTuber visited the Maharashtra Cyber office in Mahape after recording his statement.

Kaushaljis vs Kaushal review: A simple yet complex tale of second chance in loveReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Kaushaljis vs Kaushal movie review: This film is a heartfelt exploration of second chances in love, focusing on a middle-aged couple navigating the complexities of separation and familial expectations. Set in the relatable backdrop of Kannauj, the film captivates with its simplicity and stellar performances.

Dupahiya trailer: A wedding, a missing bike and a lot of chaos in offingThe first full trailer of Prime Video's upcoming comedy series, Dupahiya, is here. The show will feature actors such as Sparsh Shrivastava and Gajraj Rao in pivotal roles.

Bride-to-Be Prajakta Koli dances to Zingaat with fiance at mehndi ceremony. WatchPrajakta Koli shared glimpses of her mehndi ceremony as she danced joyfully with fiance Vrishank Khanal. The couple is set to marry on February 25.

Zero Day review: Star power can't save this weakly executed political dramaReleased-Thu Feb 20, 2025Zero Day, directed by Lesli Linka Glatter, is a political drama featuring a stellar cast including Robert De Niro and Angela Bassett. While the performances are strong, the series struggles with plot depth and resolution.

Watch: Jennie and Doechii bring the heat with ExtraL ahead of RubyJennie and Doechii are making waves with their latest collaboration, ExtraL. As Jennie gears up for her solo debut with the album Ruby, fans can expect a bold new chapter in her musical journey.

Complaint against Munawar Faruqui for 'insulting religion' on Hafta Vasooli showComedian Munawar Faruqui landed in legal trouble after a complaint was filed against him for hurting religious sentiments through his show, Hafta Vasooli. The advocate shared a copy of the complaint on X.

'Mismatched' actor Prajakta Koli shares dreamy pics from her mehndiContent creator and actor Prajakta Koli has started her pre-wedding celebrations with a vibrant mehndi ceremony. She shared joyful moments with her fiance Vrishank Khanal and family on social media.

Honey Singh's Millionaire concert in Mumbai showed what grand comebacks look likeYo Yo Honey Singh made a powerful return to the stage in Mumbai, captivating fans with his energy and heartfelt messages. His performance was a testament to his resilience and dedication to the art.

Samay Raina recalls what he asked Tanmay Bhat after India's Got Latent controversyComedian Samay Raina addresses the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's inappropriate remark on his show, India's Got Latent, during his tour in Canada. He recalled what he had asked Tanmay Bhat after the controversy erupted.
Honey Singh's jibe at Raftaar, Badshah: People say they'll write my destinyHoney Singh took a direct dig at fellow artists Badshah and Raftaar at the first Millionaire India Tour stop in Mumbai.

Watch: Honey Singh's take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi Aa Gaya Oye'Honey Singh launched his Millionaire India Tour in Mumbai, delivering a captivating performance that engaged a sold-out audience. He shared his take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi aa gays oye', emphasising unity among diverse Indian communities.

Watch: Honey Singh kicks off Millionaire tour with a grand Mumbai showRapper Honey Singh launched his Millionaire Tour with a spectacular concert in Mumbai. The show featured dramatic entrances and a lineup of energetic performances.

Undercover High School X review: Fans give thumbs up to Seo Kang-joon's K-dramaUndercover High School, featuring Seo Kang-joon and Jin Ki-joo, has premiered on MBC TV. The series, praised for its engaging storyline, follows an undercover NIS agent as a high school student.

Rapper Diddy's attorney withdraws from case: Under no circumstances can I continueAnthony Ricco, representing Sean 'Diddy' Combs, has filed to withdraw from the federal case citing reasons protected by attorney-client privilege. Ricco had once defended Osama bin Laden.

Buried Hearts review: Park Hyung-sik commands attention in his darkest roleReleased-Sat Feb 22, 2025The Korean drama Buried Hearts will captivate viewers with its blend of intense emotions and high-stakes drama. The series, featuring Park Hyung-sik, explores the complex dynamics of corporate intrigue and personal survival. Read the full review.

Rakhi Sawant reacts to summons: I'm poor, not criminal - focus on rape casesRakhi Sawant was summoned by the Maharashtra cyber cell to record her statement regarding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's controversial remarks on Samay Raina's show, 'India's Got Latent'. She urged the police to focus on solving pending rape cases instead of treating her like a criminal.

Zero Day: Critics praise Robert De Niro, criticise show's 'incoherent politics'Critics have mixed reactions to Robert De Niro's latest Netflix series, Zero Day. While many have praised De Niro, a section of them are unhappy with the narrative of the show.

Grammy-nominated band OneRepublic unites with Karan Aujla for new song Tell MeGlobal pop-rock sensation OneRepublic is collaborating with Punjabi artist Karan Aujla for a new track titled Tell Me. It will release on February 27.

Mismatched actor Prajakta Koli to marry boyfriend on February 25: ReportActor Prajakta Koli is set to marry her boyfriend Vrishank Khanal on February 25. Their wedding festivities will begin on February 23.

Crime Beat review: Rahul Bhat, Saqib Saleem's crime drama gets lost in its own chaosReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025'Crime Beat', a political thriller, premiered on Zee5 on February 21. Based on the book titled 'The Price You Pay', the show falls short due to outdated tropes and exaggerated clichés.

Honey Singh says he's a great cook, reveals his favourite dishRapper and music producer Yo Yo Honey Singh opens up about his favourite cuisine, his cooking skills and more in an exclusive interaction with us.

From heartfelt to hilarious, in praise of Park Bo-young's versatilityKorean star Park Bo-young has been acting for almost two decades now. Her ability to completely inhabit the skin of her characters makes her truly stand out. She is currently seen in Melo Movie, which is streaming on Netflix.

Honey Singh on his Mumbai concert: Doing something I've never done beforeRapper Honey Singh is starting his countrywide tour from Mumbai on Saturday. In an exclusive interview with us, the singer talked about the gig and what he's doing differently this time at 'Millionaire India Tour at Stage Aajtak'.

Kangana Ranaut's Emergency to premiere on Netflix. Check release dateKangana Ranaut's film, Emergency, is going to hit the screens next month. The actor shared a quick announcement in her Instagram stories on Friday.

Robin Tunney marks 10 years since The Mentalist finale, thanks fan for their loveActor Robin Tunney celebrated the 10th anniversary of The Mentalist finale, expressing gratitude to fans for their unwavering support. She also reflected on the show's impact on her life and career.

Atif Aslam's surprise street performance in London leaves fans in disbelief. WatchSinger Atif Aslam's video of him performing on a London street has emerged online. This surprise clip has left many fans in disbelief.

Honey Singh Millionaire tour: Reasons why it's unlike any otherYo Yo Honey Singh is set to electrify Mumbai with his high-energy performance as part of the Stage Tak Millionaire tour, promising an unforgettable night of music and nostalgia. Here are a few reasons why one should not miss it.

Nobody Wants This 2: What is Leighton Meester playing in husband Adam Brody's show?Netflix renewed 'Nobody Wants This' for season 2 last year, and now actor Leighton Meester, known for playing Blair Waldorf in 'Gossip Girl', has joined the show. Her husband, actor Adam Brody, plays the lead character, Noah, in the series.

Comic Varun Grover's sharp take on Ranveer Allahbadia, censorship and BeerBicepsComedian-lyricist Varun Grover recently took a jibe at the recent controversy surrounding podcaster Ranveer Allahbadia's appearance on India's Got Latent.

BB 18's Alice Kaushik, Tajinder Bagga, others reunite at Arfeen-Sara's Goa bashBigg Boss 18 contestants, including Alice Kaushik, Tajinder Bagga, and Nyrraa Banerjii reunited to celebrate Sara and Arfeen Khan's anniversary in Goa.

Dhanashree Verma's cryptic post amid divorce rumours: From stressed to blessedDhanashree Verma recently shared a cryptic message on social media, suggesting a shift from 'stressed to blessed'. This comes amid swirling rumours of a possible divorce with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal.

TV actor Dipika Kakar Ibrahim quits Celebrity MasterChef amid health concernsPopular TV actor Dipika Kakar Ibrahim has withdrawn from Celebrity MasterChef due to health issues. Despite the show's support, she prioritised her well-being over the competition.

Rapper-singer Honey Singh arrives in Mumbai for sold-out concertHoney Singh is in Mumbai for the much-anticipated Stage AajTak Millionaire concert this Saturday, February 22. With a fantastic set list, the sold-out show promises a night full of magic and madness.

Jisoo, Seo In-guk to star in Netflix's next show on virtual datingJisoo and Seo In-guk are joining hands for an upcoming Netflix drama, Boyfriend on Demand. The show will explore virtual reality dating.
The Last Of Us Part 2 release date announced The Last Of Us Part 2's release date has been announced. The Pedro Pascal show is all set to stream on Prime Video from April 13.

Is Eminem finally coming to India? Rapper's leaked schedule hints soLeaked documents have suggested that Eminem will perform in Mumbai in June 2025 as part of his world tour. The rapper's first visit to India is stirring excitement among fans.
Iconic TV show CID now streaming on NetflixCID on Netflix: The iconic Indian crime series CID is now available on Netflix, allowing fans worldwide to stream the popular show.

Will Prime Video's Jack Reacher ever visit India? Author Lee Child speaksAuthor Lee Child, whose Reacher books have inspired a series on Prime Video, spoke to India Today Digital, about the possibility of seeing his leading character travelling to India in the future.

general news.headline: Punjab cancels licences of 40 travel agents for sending Indians illegally to USIndia Today impact: Authorities in Amritsar have launched a massive crackdown on fake travel agents taking exorbitant fees to facilitate illegal immigration to the US, cancelling the licences of 40 of them.

AAP vs BJP on 'removal' of Ambedkar's photo from Delhi Chief Minister's officeThe opposition AAP and ruling BJP in Delhi sparred after the former alleged that photos of Dr BR Ambedkar and Bhagat Singh were taken down from the Chief Minister's office.

After Shashi Tharoor says he has options, CPI(M) hints at welcoming himShashi Tharoor's remarks on the absence of a Congress leader in Kerala and his statement that he has "options" have fueled political speculation. CPI(M) leader Thomas Isaac said Tharoor "won't be an orphan" if he leaves Congress, signaling openness to his entry.

Canada lets officials cancel study, work visas; thousands of Indians may be hitOttawa's new immigration regulations have granted Canadian border officials greater authority to cancel study and work permits under specific conditions. The move could affect thousands of Indian students, workers and tourists in Canada. With the suspension of the Student Direct Stream (SDS) visa programme months back, Canada's stricter oversight may cause delays, financial losses, and uncertainty for thousands of Indians.

Dubai drubbing confirms India vs Pakistan is no longer cricket's El ClasicoOnce considered to be the greatest rivalry in world cricket, it has now been reduced to a show of India's bench strength and the performances of their world-class stars. The gap between India and Pakistan has killed off the great rivalry and the match in Dubai in the Champions Trophy was proof of that.

Starbucks sacks 1,100 employees globally in streamlining effortIn a letter to employees, CEO Brian Niccol said the company will inform employees who are being laid off by mid-day Tuesday. Niccol said Starbucks is also eliminating several hundred open and unfilled positions.

Ranveer Allahbadia, Ashish Chanchalani record statements over Latent rowYouTubers Ranveer Allahbadia and Ashish Chanchalani have appeared before the Maharashtra Cyber Police to record their statements in connection with the 'India's Got Latent' controversy.

PM, in Bihar, prescribes superfood makhana, says he has it 300 days a yearPrime Minister Narendra Modi, addressing a rally in Bihar's Bhagalpur, said Makhana is a superfood and is an important part of breakfast for people across the country.

Dabidi Dibidi: The overlooked role of lyrics in the sexualisation of Daaku Maharaaj songThe Telugu film Daaku Maharaaj is currently streaming on Netflix. Featuring Nandamuri Balakrishna and Urvashi Rautela, the song Dabidi Dibidi faced flak for overtly sexualising women, through its vulgar choreography and lyrics.

LPU's 2025 Batch Final Year Student Bags Rs 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) Placement Package-Betireddy Naga Vamsi Reddy B. Tech student has secured a 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) package with an AI robotics company and is set to graduate in May 2025. 

-Over 1,700 students have received packages ranging from Rs 10 LPA – Rs 1 Crore per annum 

-1,912 students received multiple job offers while Adireddy Vasu, secured 7 job offers, setting a rare and impressive record.

Lokayukta ignores ED probe, asks Siddaramaiah just 30 questions in Muda caseThe Lokayukta filed a "B Report" clearing Chief Minister Siddaramaiah in the Muda scam, after asking him just 30 questions. The report exclusively accessed by India Today shows that the Lokayukta ignored critical findings from the Enforcement Directorate's investigation.

I've never mixed politics with development: Shashi Tharoor on escalating rowTharoor's praise of the LDF government—while a sticky issue for the Congress—has sparked a debate on whether the development discourse shouldn't break free of party lines

Video: Riders thrown on road as speeding car rams bike in PuneA road accident left two people injured after a speeding car hit their bike in Pune. CCTV footage of the accident showed the car suddenly taking a turn and rotating on the road after it rammed a bike.

Well near disputed Sambhal mosque situated on public land: UP to Supreme CourtThe Uttar Pradesh said a private well, locally known as Dharani Varah Koop, was situated on public land near the disputed mosque in Sambhal. It maintained that the land is situated near the disputed religious site, not inside it.

Pak intel warns of Islamic State plot to kidnap foreigners at Champions TrophyPakistan's Intelligence Bureau has warned that ISKP plans to kidnap foreigners, especially Chinese and Arab nationals, attending the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. The group is reportedly conducting surveillance at key locations.

From Ranveer Allahbadia to regulation: Will OTT shows face more policing?The row has reignited India's digital censorship debate. Tighter curbs favoured by the government and SC raise concerns about free speech and evolving morality laws

Vicky Kaushal, Katrina to Tamannaah: Celebs who took holy dip in Maha Kumbh 2025One of the biggest spiritual gathering in the world, Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 is nearing its end. The gathering saw the presence of several celebrities, including Vijay Deverakonda, Katrina Kaif, Vicky Kaushal, Preity Zinta and Rajkummar Rao, among others.

Zelenskyy proposes 'all for all' prisoners' swap with Russia to start end of warUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy proposed swapping all prisoners of war with Russia in a bid to end the ongoing war between the two nations.

Punjabi Trump song got Indians deported from US, claim people. Here's whyThe Punjabi song Trump, which boasts of illegal immigration to the US, was uploaded on YouTube 6 months ago and used in reels by those crossing into the US illegally. With the Trump administration now sending back illegal immigrants, Indians are claiming in hilarious posts that the US President started deporting Indians after listening to the Punjabi song. Even Diljit Dosanjh recently referred to the Trump song, which has 54 million views.

Uddhav Thackeray, cousin Raj's smiling photos spark strong reunion buzzRecent photos of Uddhav Thackeray, his wife Rashmi Thackeray and Raj Thackeray at a wedding together have sparked a strong reunion buzz between the Thackeray cousins after two decades of split.

Why RPF's celebration of constable with baby is earning it wrathInstead of ensuring a safe and supportive work environment, the Railway Protection Force (RPF) chose to celebrate a distressing visual a day after the stampede at New Delhi Railway station that killed 18 people. The RPF shared a photo of a woman constable managing the crowd on the platform while carrying her one-year-old child. This was slammed as "optics of Nari Shakti" and failure to provide basic support to a working mother.

Sunita Williams prepares for fiery return to Earth aboard DragonThe Crew-9 team is set to undock from the International Space Station (ISS) about a week after the arrival of Nasa's SpaceX Crew-10 mission.

Nifty set for longest losing run in 28 years. Should you be worried?The Nifty losing for five months straight is a rare sight. Last time this happened was in 1996, and before that in 1994-95, when it fell 31.4% over eight months. Right now, the index has fallen over 11% since October.

1 killed after 'criminals' attack Bangladesh air force base in Cox's BazarIn a brief statement, the Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR), the public relations division of the Bangladesh Armed Forces, said the unprecedented attack at the base in Cox's Bazar led to a confrontation.

Pics: Prajakta Koli shares dreamy photos from pre-wedding ceremonyPrajakta Koli and her boyfriend Vrishank Khanan are all set to get married soon. Today, the Mismatched actor shared a few photos from her pre-wedding festivities.

Ajay Devgn wishes wife Kajol on 26th anniversary with throwback picAjay Devgn and Kajol are celebrating their 26th wedding anniversary on February 24. On the occasion, the Raid actor extended a heartwarming wish via a throwback picture of himself with his wife.

SRK, Madhuri and Karisma's Dil to Pagal Hai to re-release in cinemasSuperstar Shah Rukh Khan, Madhuri Dixit and Karisma Kapoor's Dil To Pagal Hai will be releasing soon. The movie was directed by Yash Chopra.

sports.headline: After Champions Trophy debacle, Pakistan's brand value set to take big hit: ReportAfter a disastrous Champions Trophy campaign, the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) are all set to face a big challenge in getting sponsors for the men's team. The Pakistan team's brand value has taken a massive hit after their poor performance in the ongoing ICC event.

Don't you get paid? How Pakistan cricket greats reacted to Dubai horror showFormer Pakistan players criticised the current cricketers and the country's cricket board after the team was thrashed by India in the Champions Trophy group stage. While Wasim Akram called for bold decisions, Javed Miandad took a swipe at the players, questioning whether they were being paid enough.

Australia's Alex Carey happy with high-scoring tracks in Pakistan: A lot of funAustralia's Alex Carey has said that he is enjoying the high-scoring tracks in Pakistan after their amazing run-chase against England. Australia next face South Africa at Rawalpindi on February 25.

Dubai drubbing confirms India vs Pakistan is no longer cricket's El ClasicoOnce considered to be the greatest rivalry in world cricket, it has now been reduced to a show of India's bench strength and the performances of their world-class stars. The gap between India and Pakistan has killed off the great rivalry and the match in Dubai in the Champions Trophy was proof of that.

Watch: Wasim Akram praises Abhishek, gives priceless advice to batterChampions Trophy 2025: Abhishek Sharma had a chance to meet the legendary Wasim Akram when India and Pakistan played on Sunday, February 23 at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

AUS vs SA: Alex Carey backs inexperienced Australia bowling to defend big totalsAlex Carey has backed Australia's inexperienced bowling attack to defend any total ahead of their clash against South Africa on February 25. Australia defeated England in their first match of the tournament.

Australia vs South Africa, all you need to know: Predicted playing XI, Pitch reportChampions Trophy 2025: Steve Smith's Australia and Temba Bavuma's South Africa will face each other in an important Group B match on Tuesday, February 25 at the Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium.

Virat Kohli enjoys 'guest' Shikhar Dhawan's swagger in happy dressing room Champions Trophy 2025: Virat Kohli enjoyed the return of Shikhar Dhawan to the Indian dressing room. The former opener was invited as the special guest to the customary fielding medal ceremony after India hammered Pakistan by six wickets.

Is Kuldeep India's new death bowler? Spinner talks role after Pakistan heroicsChampions Trophy 2025: Kuldeep Yadav bowled a successful spell in the death overs against Pakistan. The spinner spoke about his new role and explained why Rohit Sharma has been using him in the final 10 overs of the match.

Rachin Ravindra recovers from nasty blow, makes Champions Trophy debutChampions Trophy 2025, NZ vs BAN: All-rounder Rachin Ravindra, who suffered a head injury in Pakistan last week, made his Champions Trophy debut on Monday in Rawalpindi. Bangladesh also made two changes, bringing back the experienced Mahmadullah.

Pakistan's green shirt brings the best out of Virat Kohli: Sunil Gavaskar Champions Trophy, IND vs PAK: Former India captain Sunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, shed light on Virat Kohli's dominant hundred against Pakistan in India's six-wicket win in Dubai. Kohli hit 100 off 111 deliveries as India chased down 242.

The spinner spoke about his new role and explained why Rohit Sharma has been using him in the final 10 overs of the match.

Bangladesh also made two changes, bringing back the experienced Mahmadullah.

Pakistan's green shirt brings the best out of Virat Kohli: Sunil Gavaskar Champions Trophy, IND vs PAK: Former India captain Sunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, shed light on Virat Kohli's dominant hundred against Pakistan in India's six-wicket win in Dubai. Kohli hit 100 off 111 deliveries as India chased down 242.

Shoaib Akhtar slams Pakistan: It is a brainless, clueless team managementPakistan are all but out of the Champions Trophy 2025 after their limp defeat to India. Legendary fast bowler Shoaib Akhtar lashed out at the team, highlighting the lack of winning culture. Virat Kohli's unbeaten 100 handed Pakistan a six-wicket hammering in Dubai on Sunday.

Virat Kohli deserves to be called 'King', not Babar Azam: Ex-Pakistan captainFormer Pakistan captain Mohammad Hafeez has slammed the spokesperson of Babar Azam, who hype the player on social media. Hafeez has said that if anyone deserves the title of 'King' it is Virat Kohli.

We should talk about Virat Kohli: Mohammad RizwanPakistan captain Mohammad Rizwan lauded Virat Kohli's match-winning century against his team, shutting down critics of the Indian batter before even addressing Pakistan's defeat. With this loss, Pakistan's hopes of reaching the Champions Trophy semi-finals came to an end.

How Virat Kohli conquered his spin demons to demolish Pakistan in DubaiStar India batter Virat Kohli was seen at his vintage best, playing a match-winning innings of 100* (111) against Pakistan in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. The batting stalwart had to conquer his spin demons to rise above the odds and script another masterful chase for the Men in Blue.

Shreyas Iyer relishing India spot as 'blessing' after heroics vs PakistanShreyas Iyer is making the most of his ODI opportunity, proving his worth with a crucial fifty against Pakistan. His consistent performances have solidified his place as India's No. 4 ahead of the Champions Trophy semi-finals.

Bangladesh ready for do-or-die clash against New Zealand: Phill SimonsBangladesh head coach Phil Simmons emphasised that his side is all geared up to face off in a do-or-die Champions Trophy clash against New Zealand on February 24. He highlighted how his side has had good training sessions in build up to the crucial Group A clash.

Rohit Sharma, Mohammed Shami injuries: Shreyas Iyer provides crucial updatesIndia vs Pakistan: India captain Rohit Sharma and fast bowler Mohammed Shami were away from the field for a fair amount of time due to injury concerns on Sunday. Shreyas Iyer provides a crucial update on the players after their second group stage game in Dubai.

IND vs PAK: Hardik delivers a Bumrah-esque performance to win over fansHardik Pandya was an unsung hero for India during their win against Pakistan as he played the role of Jasprit Bumrah during the match. Hardik picked up the wickets of Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan.

Watch: Kohli fans in Islamabad celebrate batter's century vs PakistanVirat Kohli's brilliance transcends rivalries, as Pakistan fans cheered his century during India's Champions Trophy win. The star batter's 51st ODI ton anchored India's dominant chase, proving yet again why he's adored worldwide.

Shreyas Iyer credits 'adaptability' for Dubai heroics vs PakistanIndia's Shreyas Iyer stressed the importance of adaptability in high-pressure matches, especially against rivals like Pakistan. Demonstrating this approach, he played a vital knock, scoring a crucial fifty and forging a game-changing 114-run partnership with century-maker Virat Kohli in Dubai.

India vs Pakistan clash breaks viewership record on JioHotstarThe India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy match broke records on JioHotstar on Sunday, February 23. According to news agency PTI, 60.2 corer people viewed the match just on the streaming platform.

New Zealand aim to kill two birds with one stone in Bangladesh clashChampions Trophy 2025: New Zealand have a great chance of securing their berth in the semis in their match against Bangladesh. The Tigers and Pakistan's fate of qualification also depends on this very game.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
